title: PMS 2.0 652 - IT'S DRAFT SPECTACULAR DAY, Kurt Warner, Peter Schrager, Daniel Jeremiah, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ Hawk, and the boys chat about tonight's Draft Spectacular LIVE tonight at 8 PM EST on youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow, and are joined by three great guests(Kurt Warner 16:33-40:58, Peter Schrager 1:04:05, & Daniel Jeremiah 1:44:07) to talk all things NFL Draft, and what we can expect to happen tonight. Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show, and listen on Sirius XM Channel 82, Mad Dog Radio. We appreciate the hell out of all you. See you tomorrow, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
